data.title: Having editor open keeps machine from going to sleep (OSX)
data.body: Running the editor under Yosemite (OSX) will cause the machine to not enter sleep mode.

data.title: Fix component templates
Added type to consts
Mark TypeScript enum constants as const
data.body:
export var PLANE_NEAR: FrustumPlane;

for example, should be const

data.title: SetColor now works for AnimationSprite2D
Inspector Fields - editor crash when using a VAR_QUATERNION without a default value
Double click component in inspector file chooser should select and close the window
data.body: When launching the file chooser when attaching a new JSComponent, you should be able to double click the file instead of having to select the item and then press the select button.

data.title: Check import scale on .fbx
data.body: If set to .01, it gets changed to .00999999...

data.title: Fix PhsycisWorld2D defaults
Delete an object and its dependencies
data.body: To keep the Project folder clean, it would be handy to be able to delete an object's material and its texture(s) when deleting the object from the project. This would be optional, since there is a potential for other objects to use the same material/textures.

data.title: Select multiple nodes in Hierarchy panel and Scene view
data.body: To be able to move or delete multiple nodes at once.

data.title: Lock X,Y,Z to scale uniformly
data.body: Add a lock to the scale option in the Inspector panel.

data.title: Add 3D as an option under Create Component
data.body:
Organize 3D specific components under its own header, like 2D.

Originally requested here: #159

data.title: Inspector dropdowns store open/closed state
data.body:
A node's component dropdowns in the inspector panel go back to their default states of being open/closed if you select another node and then return to it. It may be helpful if they store their last state.

Enhancement originally reported here: #159

data.title: Selecting .scml should open Spriter on double-click
data.body:
This may need a preference setting for this behavior.

Enhancement originally reported here: #159

data.title: Saving linked file in Tiled crashes the editor
data.body:
No crash report was generated

Issue reported here: #159

data.title: Playerspawn from Tiled imports as Object
data.body: All Entities, Objects and Physics are imported with the name "Object". Issue originally reported here: #159

data.title: Embed the Atomic Player in the scene view
data.body:
Give users the option of quickly switching between scene view and Play mode.

Feature request originally reported here: #159

data.title: Show project name in editor window
data.body: Enhancement originally reported here: #159

data.title: Move editor menu to the top level tool bar
data.body: Enhancement originally reported here: #159

data.title: Top level menu and editor button options expand on hover
data.body:
After you click on a menu option or a button (i.e. Create Component), hovering over the option should expand it further, if it has subcategories.

Enhancement originally reported here: #159

data.title: Add a grid to the scene view
data.body:
- Turn grid off/on

Enhancement originally reported here: #159

data.title: Change image on tick boxes and closing windows
data.body:
The checkmark and X are cartoony and out of place with the editor.

Issue originally reported here: #159

data.title: Move Play and Gizmo buttons
data.body:
Find a better location for placement. This takes up space that could give the scene view more viewing space.

Potential placement recommendations:
- After the top level menu options
- Directly above the Inspector panel
- Above the Project panel

Enhancement originally requested here: #159

data.title: Customizable panels in the editor
data.body:
- Minimize/maximize views
- Change the layout of the panels
- Save changes to your custom layout
- Change font size

Feature originally requested here: #159

data.title: Support key layouts on non-QWERTY keyboards
data.body:
i.e. Camera/scene movement using WASD doesn't work well on non-QWERTY keyboards. 

Possible fixes: change to arrow keys and/or allow users to map keys

Issue originally reported here: #159

data.title: ATOMIC-214 (with bonus)
Close Player Output window when player quits
data.body:
After running a project in the Player, a window opens with player output. This window has to be closed every time.

Issue originally reported here: #159
